ground_truth.thought: 获取主播与品牌合作的成功案例
ground_truth.name: LiveStreamingPlatform.get_success_cases

origin_prompt.content:
你是一个可以使用外部工具的助手。你可以调用以下的工具:
[{'name': 'BINGMap.get_coordinates', 'description': 'Get the coordinates of a location.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'location', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'the location need to get coordinates.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'latitude', 'description': 'the latitude of the location.'}, {'name': 'longitude', 'description': 'the longitude of the location.'}]}, {'name': 'GoogleScholar.get_citation_format', 'description': "get APA citation format by an identification of organic result's id", 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'q', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'ID of an individual Google Scholar organic search result'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'citation', 'description': 'the citation format of the article'}]}, {'name': 'BINGMap.search_nearby', 'description': 'Search for places nearby a location, within a given radius, and return the results into a list. Put the location name at the end of the query.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'search_term', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'the place name'}], 'optional_parameters': [{'name': 'places', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'the name of the location.'}, {'name': 'latitude', 'type': 'FLOAT', 'description': 'the latitude of the location.'}, {'name': 'longitude', 'type': 'FLOAT', 'description': 'the longitude of the location.'}, {'name': 'radius', 'type': 'NUMBER', 'description': 'radius in meters.'}], 'return_data': [{'name': 'places', 'description': 'the list of places, each place is a dict with name and address, at most 5 places.'}]}, {'name': 'PolygonFinance.get_ticker_detail', 'description': 'Get a single ticker supported by Polygon.io, with detailed information about the ticker and the company behind it', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'ticker', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': ''}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'address', 'description': 'company address'}, {'name': 'homepage_url', 'description': ''}, {'name': 'description', 'description': 'A description of the company and what they do/offer'}, {'name': 'list_date', 'description': 'The date that the symbol was first publicly listed'}, {'name': 'name', 'description': 'The name of the asset'}]}, {'name': 'PolygonFinance.search_stock_ticker', 'description': 'get the stock ticker given the company name', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'search', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'search for terms within the ticker and/or company name'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'ticker', 'description': 'The exchange symbol that this item is traded under'}, {'name': 'name', 'description': 'The name of the asset'}]}, {'name': 'LiveStreamingPlatform.get_cooperation_models', 'description': 'Get the cooperation models between a live streaming platform and brands.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'platform', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'the name of the live streaming platform'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'cooperation_models', 'description': 'the list of cooperation models'}]}, {'name': 'LiveStreamingPlatform.get_marketing_effectiveness', 'description': 'Get the marketing effectiveness data of brands on a live streaming platform.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'platform', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'the name of the live streaming platform'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'marketing_effectiveness', 'description': 'the marketing effectiveness data'}]}, {'name': 'LiveStreamingPlatform.get_success_cases', 'description': 'Get successful cases of cooperation between anchors and brands on a live streaming platform.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'platform', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'the name of the live streaming platform'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'success_cases', 'description': 'the list of successful cases'}]}]
如果你已经知道答案，请调用FinishAction来提供最终的回复。
我是一名市场分析师，正在研究直播经济中的品牌合作。你能帮我获取直播平台与品牌的合作模式吗？另外，我需要了解品牌在直播平台上的营销效果数据。接着，我需要获取主播与品牌合作的成功案例。最后，基于这些信息，为我提供一些关于如何进行有效的品牌合作的建议。当前这一步的目标是什么?
获取直播平台与品牌的合作模式
当前这一步要调用的工具名称是什么?
当前工具的参数'platform'的值是什么?

接下来要调用的工具的参数为：{'cooperation_models': ['Sponsored Live Streams', 'Product Placement', 'Brand Takeovers', 'Collaborative Campaigns']}
请回答以下问题：当前这一步的目标是什么?
获取品牌在直播平台上的营销效果数据
当前这一步要调用的工具名称是什么?
当前工具的参数'platform'的值是什么?

接下来要调用的工具的参数为：{'marketing_effectiveness': {'engagement_rate': 0.15, 'conversion_rate': 0.12, 'ROI': 2.5}}
请回答以下问题：当前这一步的目标是什么?

prediction: 获取品牌在直播平台上的营销效果数据。
